name: under-the-black-cross
description: project page for the Vampire 20th Dark Ages Campaign 'Under the Black Cross'

scripts.release:major: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(release): updated CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(release): updated CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: ./node_modules/generate-changelog/bin/generate -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(release): updated CHANGELOG.md' && pnpm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
